From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: Monday 
Date: Mon, 16 Sep 2019 13:58:33 +0000 
Thank you! 
From: 
Sent: Monda , Se tember 16, 2019 9:54 AM 
To: 
Subj : on ay 
Sure, I can do it. If one of y'all gets the call when he arrives just let me know. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, September 16, 2019 09:52 
To: 
Su je . Kt. monday 
Agree that this can definitely be one person. if you wouldn't mind handling, that would be amazing. I'm trying to 
get oppositions to suppression motions drafted in Tartaglione and would be grateful for the extra time. 
From: 
Sent: on ay, September 16, 2019 9:50 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Monday 
I think this is probably eminently handle-able by one person, unless anybody disagrees? 'm happy to join if 
you'd like, or to just handle, or if you feel like doing it then I'm totally happy to defer (and I'll just continue to prep for 
California interviews). Agree with hat certainly in the first instance it's likely to involve getting a list of names and 
not particularly credibility-heavy, such that we'd want a couple people to be able to weigh in on the info up the chain. 
Thoughts? 
From: 
Sent: Monday, September 16, 2019 09:26 
To: 
Subject: . on ay 
â€¢ 
Sorry, this got lost in my inbox. No problem at all if you still need to skip this. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, September 13, 2019 4:13 PM 
To: 
Subject: Monday 
Sorry to ask, but is it okay if I don't join you guys for Monday's interview with I'm trying to find time to 
meet with another case team, and it looks like Monday morning would work best for that. 
EFTA00030711

v
as Epstein's long-time house manager in NY, but we don't know anything beyond that, so the purpose of the 
interview is really just to identify other employees and see what if anything he saw at the house. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00030712
